General.Name: Liaoning Xinde New Material Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Liaoning Xinde New Material Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of lithium battery negative electrode coating materials and carbon fiber spun pitch products in China. Its products portfolio includes lithium battery anode material pitch, high-temperature asphalt, very high-temperature asphalt, medium temperature asphalt, and XD270 products; and lithium battery anode coating materials. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Liaoyang, China.
